channel.title: ::vote command

item.title: ::vote command
item.dc:creator: @xDivinity xDivinity
item.description:
@xDivinity wrote:

Hi everyone, i’ve added the vote command in my server and it wont load the link it just sits there.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("http://google.com/toplist/details-37344-Turmoil_PK.html", 12000); }

Thats the command server sided in commands.java

I also just now added this in the jframe folder client sided because ::vote wasnt doing anything

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("vote")) { openUpWebSite("http://runelocus.com/toplist/details-37344-Turmoil_PK.html"); }

And now my server won’t even let me log in:(
Ps. this is delta

Read full topic
